languages.text: "Красивая метафора, но, судя по характеру разрушений, я бы скорее ставил на мельта-заряды".

traits.locale_text: "Красивая метафора, но, судя по характеру разрушений, я бы скорее ставил на мельта-заряды".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."
languages.original_text: "Красивая метафора, но, судя по характеру разрушений, я бы скорее ставил на мельта-заряды".

traits.locale_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."

traits.locale_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “真是个相当不错的比喻。不过，根据损害的实质判断，我认为这更像是被热熔炸药炸的。”
languages.original_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."

traits.locale_text: “真是个相当不错的比喻。不过，根据损害的实质判断，我认为这更像是被热熔炸药炸的。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Una bonita metáfora, pero, a juzgar por la naturaleza de los daños, diría que son obra de cargas de fusión».
languages.original_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."

traits.locale_text: «Una bonita metáfora, pero, a juzgar por la naturaleza de los daños, diría que son obra de cargas de fusión».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「美しい比喩ね。でも損傷の性質からして、私はメルタ爆薬に賭けるよ」
languages.original_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."

traits.locale_text: 「美しい比喩ね。でも損傷の性質からして、私はメルタ爆薬に賭けるわ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Eine hübsche Metapher, aber basierend auf der Natur des Schadens würde ich eher auf Melterladungen tippen."
languages.original_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."

traits.locale_text: "Eine hübsche Metapher, aber basierend auf der Natur des Schadens würde ich eher auf Melterladungen tippen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Belle métaphore, mais vu les dégâts, je parierais plutôt sur des charges à fusion. »
languages.original_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."

traits.locale_text: « Belle métaphore, mais vu les dégâts, je parierais plutôt sur des charges à fusion. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hoş bir metafor ancak hasarın doğasını göz önünde bulundurduğumuzda benim tahminim melta bombalarından yana olur."
languages.original_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."

traits.locale_text: "Hoş bir metafor ancak hasarın doğasını göz önünde bulundurduğumuzda benim tahminim melta saldırılarından yana olur."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "A pretty metaphor, but based on the nature of the damage, I would place my bet on melta charges."
